comment: i love her real bad. we only had class once a week but she was really funny and easy going. she made class really enjoyable and we only wrote like 3 papers the entire year and we spent a few weeks on each one. she gives modules as homework but they literally don't take more than 20/30 mins. definitely would recommend her
Was a very fun teacher and would give many chances to complete papers correctly. The feedback was very constructive, and she was very easy to talk to.

Great professor. The class isn't unnecessarily difficult and there are only 3 essays in the class, which she gives feedback on every time you complete one. She also let our class go 5-10 minutes early pretty often. Simply finish the reading logs (which are easy) and do the assignments on time. Standard class, chill professor
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Wells is kind and caring. She is very engaging in lectures and very approachable for questions and feedback

Dr Wells is a very relatable and hilarious professor. If you get offended easily, maybe don't take this class. Dr Wells has a very down-to-earth humor, but I could potentially see some people getting offended. The classload is not terrible, and her grading is truly based on the effort you put into your work. This was my favorite course this year.

She is clearly unequipped to teach a graduate-level course. Her syllabus and assignments were borrowed from another professor who teaches a different course. She did not proofread them, so there were numerous, significant errors. Excessive assignments which were busy work without substance. She was unorganized and lacked tact and professionalism.

My absolute favorite prof so far. Her class was SO much fun and she's hilarious! She doesn't keep you the entire class time. took her again for engl1102. Wonderful teacher. Barely any hw & it's due a week after it's given. Super chill and makes the class laugh all the time! Answers any questions and easy to talk to. Answers emails really quick too!

I didn't know how to edit but I just wanted to say I would not have passed any class under the same circumstances with another professor I don't think. I am pretty good at English but terrible at online classes
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: My class was hybrid 50% online but due to different reasons it was more like 75% online. I don't usually do well with that but I did enjoy when we did have class and she graded papers fairly. They is a lot of homework though. It reminded me of high school. Also she is a high school teacher as well so that checks

english is my worse subject and I got an A. do all the chapter readings, thesis assignments, and turn in solid essays, youll get an A or High B. Shes straightforward with a sense of humor, and keeps it real. only 3 essays. take her!
Shes very understanding and chill shes there to help and an easy grader
